content: this pattern was designed for the 2025 supersock world championship /groups/supersock-world-championship now the pattern is free to download thank you to the mods and all the test knitters - your help has been wonderful this pattern is written for a cuff down sock with a heel flap in four sizes 56 64 72 and 80 sts despite the small cables the sock is stretchy and you should be able to knit your usual size thank you to all the racers that knitted this pattern - i have enjoyed every single one of your projects *if you want to give a thank you for the free pattern please feel free to donate $5 to doctors without borders or any other charity of your choice * *from the swc page as part of last s years random spin team hogwarts was awarded the choice to name the charity for 2025 the 2025 swc charity is doctors without borders * * caution we do ask you to verify your donation type as a 1-time donation only unless you want a monthly one which is the default *
